html:
10.3.18  1:19 pm   I just found this website and I'm really confused so hows your day

     pretty good

10.3.18  12:55 pm   do you enjoy paper?

     sometimes

10.3.18  12:46 pm   How do I know if I Am succeeding? 

     you will start showing some of the Seven Signs of Success

10.3.18  12:41 pm   what's a big breakthrough you had when you cut down your production time to 2 weeks?

     desperation i think. somehow it reminds me of when you are a baby in the womb and you are scared to get out for months and months and then one day you realize if you stay in here one more day you're gonna die so you get out somehow and afterwards you have no memory of how the hell you did it

10.3.18  12:05 pm   when you read a book does the book also read you?

     if it's digital then it could be

10.3.18  11:28 am   Hey Bill, I'm the guy who had the problem with learning reading sheet music and playing piano at the same time. Just checking in to say your advice really helped as I am getting much more familiar with it as an instrument first. follow up question, when you are absolutely ripping the keyboard solo in la de da, what are those two semi wheels that seem to make it sound as if you are bending the notes on a guitar?

     pitch bend, and the other one. most keyboards have those 2 wheels. the pitch bend wheel is spring loaded and usually gives you a whole step either way (or you can set it different if u want) and the other wheel is not spring loaded, and does different things depending on the instrument but on many instruments it's vibrato. i mostly use it for vibrato, on that particular sound i have it for vibrato. but on many sounds i use it for filter cutoff ("wawa"). very useful, especially in getting your digital instrument to sound a bit more like something 'real'

10.3.18  11:01 am   at what point do you commit to your lyric ideas?  

     at Commitment Time

10.3.18  10:45 am   how many songs have you planned for?

     i could do them forever but i need to do other things too

10.3.18  10:30 am   Hi, Bill. What motivates you to keep making songs? 

     thrill seeking

10.3.18  10:14 am   any new videos?

     doing them constantly. each one is new, and then the next one in turn is new

10.3.18  10:14 am   serious question...how do you come up with these super creative/funny videos...just how do you do it?

     i don't know

10.3.18  9:25 am   10.2.18  7:03 pm If you still don't know then... How are you able to make songs?

     it's kind of like growing arms and legs. none of us quite knew how to do it but somehow we did it

10.3.18  9:08 am   what does it mean when a chords is written like G/B ? do i play both at the same time?

     G chord with B note in the bass. "G over B" .. G chord over B bass note.

10.3.18  8:29 am   Whens the next song coming out.

     oct 16

10.3.18  7:56 am   Why do we often see you use 'darn' over 'damn' in your content?

     i've used both a lot but i am looking for new things to try

10.3.18  7:16 am   why do people put sponsorships into videos for money

     yep

10.3.18  6:31 am   You weren't lying about the key changes in your latest song. Got any milk for all that spice?

     only cheese

10.3.18  5:45 am   Did you know that Mt. St. Helens is already blew up?

     not when i wrote the first line of the song, but i found out after

10.3.18  5:33 am   what do you think of this

     it's ok

10.3.18  4:03 am   What is the name of the blimp in "Mount St Helens is about to Blow Up", or if it doesn't have a name, what's a good name for a blimp?

     My Blimp

10.3.18  2:50 am   in your song, the moon is made of cheese. what does this mean to you? especially with regards to the fact that the real moon is actually made of meat. 

     i just got jealous of all country songs for having these long clever titles with the fun baked right into the title. i would like to do those for the rest of my life if possible

10.3.18  2:49 am   what video games do you like

     countdown timer

10.3.18  2:27 am   how do you do the neon text and the cool animations like what software because I was going to do something for a project inspired by how you make your videos

     i'm going to be teaching classes

10.3.18  1:47 am   Typing the time and date distracts the hell out of me
I should only do it for stuff I feel necessary, on my phone?

     computers like to keep track of the date, generally. if you can find yourself in a situation where the computer is keeping track of the date, that will be a very friendly situation for you. although i realize that some apps and systems might not do it they way you intended ....

10.3.18  1:15 am   How serious are you considering this new one-week schedule?

     mildly, slightly

10.3.18  12:49 am   do you have an idea of when you will start working on the reality stuff again, or no

     like every moment i wish. that's how it's always been

10.3.18  12:46 am   social anxiety wh a t to do help

     invest in foreign currencies!

10.3.18  12:24 am   Does your randy page only involves questions from '16, '17, and '18? If so why?

     that's when almost all of the questions are from

10.3.18  12:07 am   Why do you keep going to rehab when people ask "Why do you keep doing X in your songs?"?

     it's just a nice gesture i think

      I think keeping your experiences and techniques would be good.

     i may do that after

10.3.18  12:05 am   Why do you keep manually drawing your lyrics in your songs? Is it just easier?

     no but,

      It's a cool effect.

     that's the reason. however i hope to come up with something a little different

10.3.18  12:00 am   Do you feel you make music more for yourself or for others?

     both together

10.2.18  11:39 pm   If you could be an animal, which would it be?

     computers

10.2.18  11:33 pm   How long does editing take for the average short song? The visuals are always crazy

     it usually takes about 8 weeks but i recently lost my marbles and now it only takes 2 for some reason

10.2.18  11:30 pm   Was the moon landing faked and is actually just cheese?

     they really did it but then they had to fake it anyway because they brought the wrong flag

10.2.18  11:22 pm   according to your latest drop, the TV is on the stereo, and birds are really trees. is it all going straight to hell?

     coming back from

10.2.18  11:01 pm   do you know you inspire the world?

     i am trying to do a better job at it

10.2.18  10:49 pm   What do you think influenced you most in developing your unique style?

     the desire to be reasonable, and sensible

      Were you always into music, or did it just develop?

     it always developed

10.2.18  10:45 pm   When can I listen to your music on vinyl?

     i will get that done as soon as i can

10.2.18  10:30 pm   What is the most natural element of all ?

     time

10.2.18  10:26 pm   what gave you the idea for the latest song

     the moon

10.2.18  10:24 pm   other than making music, what do you find fulfilling? 

     making video to go along with the music

10.2.18  9:59 pm   In your most recent video, why are the leaves turquoise out of all the colors?

     i don't know but the other option was something about the cars in my garage drive away. the leaves/turquoise line arrived as a package deal, with the melody/chord figure. i was aware after the fact that purple was eagerly trying to swap in but not as strong. i now just realized fuscia may have been stronger but maybe not as understandible especially with no visual

10.2.18  9:45 pm   What was going through your head when you made a song that starts with you wanting to lick the moon?

     i really think it's just gonna be the doctor song, there's nothing wrong with the song, it's a fine song, just chill out, if you had less time you would accept the doctor song instantly, just calm the f down and pick the doctor song owo what's this

10.2.18  9:12 pm   Is 'the moon is made of cheese, but i can't taste it' based on a true story?

     yes, it's based on 'I Never Thought Such A Short Time Would Feel So Long, Now What The Hell Am I Gonna Do With All This Long Feeling Short Time In Such A Short Time'

10.2.18  8:39 pm   is there any big project going on behind all these other great things you've been putting out?

     no but there should be

10.2.18  8:20 pm   So do you right music in the right hand and lyrics with the left? 

     no

10.2.18  8:10 pm   Are the satanic overlords pleased with your latest offering

     yes, too much actually. i need to dial it back

10.2.18  7:53 pm   Do you spend time reading some YouTube comments from your videos with people trying to interprete your lyrics?

I remember my philosophy teacher saying that every interpretations are true do you agree with that?

I want to say I agree but if it's far from what the author wanted to say or like interpreting a red shirt while the author just felt like adding a red shirt... it seems "wrong" to me. 

     the song is like a bus, for meaning. all aboard the meaning bus

10.2.18  7:42 pm   Ok, the moon might be cheap, but is there ANYTHING good about the moon?

     it is very nice and has a nice rhythm to it

10.2.18  7:39 pm   In your songs "me" is you, "you" is us but who are "they"? 

     usually the clergy
